name: website-portfolio
description:
Primary website and data storage for my portfolio projects using:

  • Vite as React Frontend
  • Express as Backend
  • MongoDB as Primary Database
  • Axios and Socket.io for API Requests

scripts.build: npm install && npm install --prefix client && npm run build --prefix client
scripts.buildDev: npm run build --prefix client && npm-run-all --parallel mongo start

author: Sakyto
